cast.name: 玛莎·希加瑞达 Martha Higareda
查德·迈克尔·墨瑞 Chad Michael Murray
本尼托·马丁内斯 Benito Martinez
露贝·安缇维洛 Lupe Ontiveros

director.name: 帕特里夏·卡多索 Patricia Cardoso

introduction: 大学生Sofia听到自己妹妹自杀的消息回家，发现了不可告人的秘密。Sometimes the most shocking truths lie right in front of us... though they remain unseen. In Lies In Plain Sight, blind college student Sofia Delgado (Martha Higareda) returns home after the unexpected suicide of her cousin Eva. Left with no easy answers, Sofia must unravel the mystery of Eva's complex relationship with boyfriend Ethan McAllister (Chad Michael Murray, TV's One Tree Hill) and confront dark family secrets long denied by Eva's mother Marisol (Rosie Perez, Pineapple Express, Do the Right Thing). Risking everything, even her own life, Sofia will dare to uncover the hidden truth that drove Eva to her death.
